description: A Railway is a transportation space used by wheeled vehicles on rails.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the Railway.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the Railway.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the Railway.

properties.name: section
properties.description: Relates to the sections that are part of the Railway.

properties.name: intersection
properties.description: Relates to the intersections that are part of the Railway.
